title: Why doesnt Riot just take the DOTA approach with Sated Devourer instead of ruining it because of WW?
body:
-> Buff Warwick (ult CD, base damage)
-> Sated Devourer: "item is disabled on this champion"

Now every other champion with on-hit skills can actually use the item. And the item will no longer be a direct nerf to Warwick.

[](http://i.imgur.com/wD3sVSO.jpg)
